verses.text_plain: The burden of the word of the Lord for Israel, saith the Lord, which stretcheth forth the heavens, and layeth the foundation of the earth, and formeth the spirit of man within him.
verses.verse_html: 1The burden of the word of the Lord for Israel, saith the Lord, which stretcheth forth the heavens, and layeth the foundation of the earth, and formeth the spirit of man within him.

verses.text_plain: Behold, I will make Jerusalem a cup of trembling unto all the people round about, when they shall be in the siege both against Judah and against Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html:
2Behold, I will make Jerusalem a cup of trembling unto all the people round about, when they shall be in the siege both against Judah and against Jerusalem. ▼
▼ trembling: or, slumber, or, poison
 , ▼
▼ when…: or, and also against Judah shall he be which shall be in siege against Jerusalem

tokens.text: when they shall be in the siege

footnotes.body_html: ▼ trembling: or, slumber, or, poison

footnotes.body_text: ▼ when…: or, and also against Judah shall he be which shall be in siege against Jerusalem
footnotes.body_html: ▼ when…: or, and also against Judah shall he be which shall be in siege against Jerusalem

verses.text_plain: And in that day will I make Jerusalem a burdensome stone for all people: all that burden themselves with it shall be cut in pieces, though all the people of the earth be gathered together against it.
verses.verse_html: 3And in that day will I make Jerusalem a burdensome stone for all people: all that burden themselves with it shall be cut in pieces, though all the people of the earth be gathered together against it.

tokens.text: themselves with it shall be cut in pieces

verses.text_plain: In that day, saith the Lord, I will smite every horse with astonishment, and his rider with madness: and I will open mine eyes upon the house of Judah, and will smite every horse of the people with blindness.
verses.verse_html: 4In that day, saith the Lord, I will smite every horse with astonishment, and his rider with madness: and I will open mine eyes upon the house of Judah, and will smite every horse of the people with blindness.

verses.text_plain: And the governors of Judah shall say in their heart, The inhabitants of Jerusalem shall be my strength in the Lord of hosts their God.
verses.verse_html:
5And the governors of Judah shall say in their heart, The inhabitants of Jerusalem shall be my strength in the Lord of hosts their God. ▼
▼ The inhabitants…: or, There is strength to me and to the inhabitants, etc

footnotes.body_text: ▼ The inhabitants…: or, There is strength to me and to the inhabitants, etc
footnotes.body_html: ▼ The inhabitants…: or, There is strength to me and to the inhabitants, etc

verses.text_plain: In that day will I make the governors of Judah like an hearth of fire among the wood, and like a torch of fire in a sheaf; and they shall devour all the people round about, on the right hand and on the left: and Jerusalem shall be inhabited again in her own place, even in Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 6In that day will I make the governors of Judah like an hearth of fire among the wood, and like a torch of fire in a sheaf; and they shall devour all the people round about, on the right hand and on the left: and Jerusalem shall be inhabited again in her own place, even in Jerusalem.

verses.text_plain: The Lord also shall save the tents of Judah first, that the glory of the house of David and the glory of the inhabitants of Jerusalem do not magnify themselves against Judah.
verses.verse_html: 7The Lord also shall save the tents of Judah first, that the glory of the house of David and the glory of the inhabitants of Jerusalem do not magnify themselves against Judah.

verses.text_plain: In that day shall the Lord defend the inhabitants of Jerusalem; and he that is feeble among them at that day shall be as David; and the house of David shall be as God, as the angel of the Lord before them.
verses.verse_html:
8In that day shall the Lord defend the inhabitants of Jerusalem; and he that is feeble among them at that day shall be as David; and the house of David shall be as God, as the angel of the Lord before them. ▼
▼ feeble: or, abject: Heb. fallen

footnotes.body_html: ▼ feeble: or, abject: Heb. fallen

verses.text_plain: And it shall come to pass in that day, that I will seek to destroy all the nations that come against Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 9And it shall come to pass in that day, that I will seek to destroy all the nations that come against Jerusalem.

tokens.text: And it shall come to pass in that day

verses.text_plain: And I will pour upon the house of David, and upon the inhabitants of Jerusalem, the spirit of grace and of supplications: and they shall look upon me whom they have pierced, and they shall mourn for him, as one mourneth for his only son, and shall be in bitterness for him, as one that is in bitterness for his firstborn.
verses.verse_html: 10And I will pour upon the house of David, and upon the inhabitants of Jerusalem, the spirit of grace and of supplications: and they shall look upon me whom they have pierced, and they shall mourn for him, as one mourneth for his only son, and shall be in bitterness for him, as one that is in bitterness for his firstborn.

tokens.text: upon me whom they have pierced
for him, as one that is in bitterness

verses.text_plain: In that day shall there be a great mourning in Jerusalem, as the mourning of Hadadrimmon in the valley of Megiddon.
verses.verse_html: 11In that day shall there be a great mourning in Jerusalem, as the mourning of Hadadrimmon in the valley of Megiddon.

verses.text_plain: And the land shall mourn, every family apart; the family of the house of David apart, and their wives apart; the family of the house of Nathan apart, and their wives apart;
verses.verse_html:
12And the land shall mourn, every family apart; the family of the house of David apart, and their wives apart; the family of the house of Nathan apart, and their wives apart; ▼
▼ every…: Heb. families, families

footnotes.body_html: ▼ every…: Heb. families, families

verses.text_plain: The family of the house of Levi apart, and their wives apart; the family of Shimei apart, and their wives apart;
verses.verse_html:
13The family of the house of Levi apart, and their wives apart; the family of Shimei apart, and their wives apart; ▼
▼ of Shimei: or, of Simeon, as LXX

footnotes.body_text: ▼ of Shimei: or, of Simeon, as LXX
footnotes.body_html: ▼ of Shimei: or, of Simeon, as LXX

verses.text_plain: All the families that remain, every family apart, and their wives apart.
verses.verse_html: 14All the families that remain, every family apart, and their wives apart.
